responses: Hello! Would you like to know about a monastery in Sikkim?
Hi there 👋 Ask me about monasteries, their history, or location.
Namaste 🙏 Which monastery would you like to explore?
Goodbye! Hope you visit a monastery soon.
See you later, keep exploring Sikkim’s monasteries.
Tashi Delek! Come back if you want to learn more.
You’re welcome 🙏
Happy to help with your monastery search!
My pleasure — Sikkim’s monasteries are truly special.
